title: HaveYouHeard
description:
Get in Front of High-Intent Leads on Reddit.

HaveYouHeard automates lead discovery, boosting your product’s visibility with audiences ready to take action:
- Continuously find high-intent posts where your product is a natural fit
- Leverage AI to assist with comments, while keeping your personal, human touch
- Reach leads actively searching for solutions, driving more sales
- Benefit from Reddit’s enhanced visibility on Google
